124.content:
You decide you wanted to test it out at school, packed the device in your bags and considered your options.

Once you arrive at school you decided it would be best to try it with a random girl, swapping with a guy or a teacher didn't seem as enjoyable and you didn't want to mess with your crush in case things go wrong.

You decide to head to the mall. There are so many people there that it's hard to choose. You sit on a bench with the device next to you as you ponder all the possibilities. However, before you can decide, a woman comes up next to you. She is blonde with a shapely figure. She's wearing a cropped shirt to accentuate her small waist and black disco jeans to show off her round butt.

She picks up the device next to you, "I haven't seen one of these in ages! But I've never seen one with body parts before. What happens when you land on one?"
